def solve(str):
    return re.sub(r'_([a-z])', lambda m: m.group(1).upper(), str)

def solve(s):
    return re.sub(r"_(\w)", lambda m: m.group(1).upper(), s)

def solve(s):
    return re.sub('_(.)', lambda m: m.group(1).upper(), s)

def solve(s):
    return re.sub(r'_([a-z])', lambda m: m.group(1).upper(), s)
